name: Switchonlight
0:
”Alexa,turn on Bedroom light”
”Alexa,turn off Kitchen light”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
With the MIXBERRY Switch on light skill and Alexa, you can interact with your MIXBERRY Switch on light and turn on/off by voice. To get started, select the 'Enable Skilll' button in the Alexa app to link your MIXBERRY Smartmania app account and discover you device(s). Find more information about connecting Smart Home device at http://amzn.to/291lR7u

When using the skill, you need to specify by name which device to use. There are two ways to define this/these name(s):
*Use the name(s) you set up already-these are shown in thr MIXBERRY Smartmania App and can be changed, or
*Created an Alexa group, like Bedroom or Downstairs and add the device to the group. More information is avaliable at http://amzn.to/2965dCE.

Once you know the name or group of you device(s),you can say the following:
*If you have bedroom light, you can turn them on/off,for example:"Alexa,turn on Bedroom light".
